lender.occupational_info: I consult financial advisors in regards to what type of technology they should be using in their practices to gain time efficiency and stay compliant with the SEC.

lender.name: Jeff A Taylor
lender.loan_because: helping people help themselves

lender.name: Lawrence Cardarelli
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. And you should too.

lender.name: Cara
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work for my family's business that sells medical equipment. I am also a full time mommy.

lender.name: Jan
lender.occupational_info: I am working on eliminating child malnutrition in the world.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: Helping people become self-reliant is very important to me.
lender.occupational_info:
I manage the office for a small international student homestay program. We bring students from other countries to experience life in the United States for a few weeks.
I also design and make beaded jewelery which I sell online.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I want to help others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I love to challenge myself and to create things that are useful and enriching to others, and this is a great opportunity to share that gift with people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I have a passion for languages and cultures, dance and movement, writing and teaching. My ultimate goal is to combine these passions into a life mission that benefits others.

lender.name: carole
lender.loan_because: I don't do enough to help other people.

lender.name: Giulio
lender.loan_because: the time of poverty is over.
lender.occupational_info: awareness traveler.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I live a fortunate life.
lender.occupational_info: When my son was killed in Iraq in 2004, I became very active in the peace community. If we could end the occupation in Iraq tonite, it wouldn't be soon enough.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: i want to make a difference wihout giving free handouts. In kiva i think its like the old saying "give a man a fish he eats for a day, teach a man to fish, he eats for life" In Kiva you dont give for a day you invest in a life

lender.name: McGuire Family
lender.loan_because: As you did it to one of the least of these my brethren, you did it to me. -- Jesus
lender.occupational_info: Make computer systems work with people and talk to one another.

lender.name: Elaina
lender.loan_because: It can make a difference.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Others are in need, and I have been blessed with plenty.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I direct a center that has the mission of designing goods and services for the poorest 80% of humanity.

lender.name: logan, taylor and hunter
lender.loan_because: i feel very blessed for all that i have and it makes me happy to give to others. i also wish to teach my 3 children to give. they are also learning about other countries as we study where the people are whom we are helping.
lender.occupational_info: i am fortunate to be able to stay at home and raise my children full time.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: my small loan has a much larger impact.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: it is a wonderful way to help others. Everyone can use a helping hand at one point or another and I am glad to help entrepreneurs who are starting their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a lawyer for a manufacturing corporation. My company makes food processing equipment (freezers, ovens, etc.) for food manufacturers and I handle the legal work related to my business.

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: He gave

lender.name: John and Smokey
lender.loan_because: to help a little
lender.occupational_info: I work in bronze and aluminum, and occasionally steel.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: it's a tax benifit

lender.name: Fred Jansen
lender.loan_because: I like to help others who need it.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I would like to see someone benefit from something we take for granted.

lender.name: debora
lender.loan_because: I support the entrepreneurial spirit.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Sometimes people just need a little bit of help to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I write software for cable television set-top boxes.

lender.name: Art & Sachkia
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected
lender.occupational_info: We'd say our work is centred around community development and enrichment. Service can most times be the most fulfilling venture one can undertake.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I give because I truly believe that to whom much is given, much is expected. So, I give because I have been blessed to have something to give.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student. I am in school working on my doctorate.

lender.name: Isabel
lender.loan_because: Because it is my heart to help people that are not as fortunate as we are!!

lender.name: Gericke
lender.loan_because: it's such a small risk that can make such a large difference in someone else's life. I'm grateful to Kiva for providing a platform for making small efforts significant.
lender.occupational_info: I began as a researcher in Tanzania, studying changes in savanna structure after fire or elephant browsing. Now, I use GPS technology and mapping software to analyze spatial patterns of landscapes, make maps, and process field data for managing agriculture pests in the Western US.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I edit commercials, music videos, and feature films.

lender.name: Traci
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to be blessed with so much and to give back is truly important to me.

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: In this world of chaos and inhumanity it is up to us as individuals to be compassionate to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Vietnam veteran, which is why I primarily lend to people in Vietnam. Until I retired I worked with incarcerated US military veterans to develop release plans through which they can transform their lives and become stable, productive and positive individuals. Prior to that I worked with homeless individuals with substance abuse or mental health issues.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: I love to help people. I do not see my money as a way to live better, I see it as a way to help others. I lived in West Africa for a couple of years and know the struggles that can be avoided with just small loans to hardworking people.
lender.occupational_info: I assist in global health efforts and projects, mainly in the AIDS field.

lender.name: lil a-goo
lender.loan_because: my mommy and daddy say that it's important to lend a hand to those who are trying to help themselves. and it feels good too!
lender.occupational_info: see picture

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: It is interesting and helpful.

lender.name: Nicole & Troy
lender.occupational_info: Nicole teaches English language and Troy is a mechanical engineer. We live in Australia.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jeffrey Lewis Knapp
lender.loan_because: After we read Bill Clinton’s book “Giving”, we decided to become involved with Kiva. Tarina Brooke Knapp Foundation supports educational scholarships and working to reach personal goals. Kiva.org offers impressive opportunities, in agreement with the basic goals of our TBK foundation, for people to better them selves, grow, and advance as individuals or groups of individuals to achieve awareness, fulfillment and better realization through understanding. Thank you Lord. Thank you Jesus.
lender.occupational_info: I work full time with a local blood bank collecting life saving blood each day from volunteer donors within the state. The recipients of the blood, the patients, they are important, they need the blood, and they make my work worth the effort and the time, long hours, wonderful people. I am also a platelet donor and a long time blood donor. Donating blood is good for your body & your community. Blood donation is volunteer work. If you have a resume, include your blood donation efforts in detail on your resume under community service. Donating blood every eight weeks to help in your community is a grand magnificent service and a tremendously rewarding experience.

lender.name: Jo S
lender.loan_because: I am interested in supporting women wishing to become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: Although I am retired I am still very busy with family, travel and hobbies.

lender.name: Don B
lender.loan_because: I like helping people who help themselves.

lender.name: Armando
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Independent contractors do many things...

lender.name: Murray & Janet
lender.loan_because: We want to share what God has blessed us with.
lender.occupational_info: Murray has been cutting hair for over 35 years. Janet works part time in a farm & home store.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Agricultural Scientist/University Professor

lender.name: Shylock
lender.loan_because:
Like God, I want to help people who want to help themselves. I don't get out much, and it's hard to identify worthy entrepreneurs in my area who don't need a lot. I am starting my own private school in Mexico and I know how hard it can be to get started in a developing country. I, however, get a great deal of non-monetary support from my family.
This plan promotes human dignity all around. There is dignity in lending in a manner that is devoid of the profit motive, and this organization makes it possible for even modest middle class earners to partake of this reward. More importantly, it allows poor entrepreneurs to improve their lot, but exacts no affective tribute. On the contrary, by presenting them with an opportunity to make good on a reasonably attainable commitment, it enhances individual and group pride.
It is indeed a win-win proposition.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to local Mexicans.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Miguel
lender.loan_because: it´s everyone´s responsability, for me a big opportunity, to contribute with small action to play an important role on helping others to develop and improve their quality life.
lender.occupational_info: Brand Space=Nice place CenárioUrbano is a Portuguese Company who intends to develope and find solutions that may strengthen and improve the architectural qualification of underprofited urban areas, with visibility of the brand, offering different alternatives to the usual media.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I'm hoping that this money will have a realistic impact on the lives of people who receive it around the world, and will eventually have the effect of improving and sustaining developing economies.

lender.name: Kinsan
lender.loan_because: this money gives hope. When one gets out of the rut, it breathes new life to families and the future generation. Children will get to go to school, and through education, one is then totally out of poverty, and become the next generation of leaders.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I like to work through Kiva because I can loan money directly to people whose circumstances speak to me. I hope their futures will be brighter due to Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: My husband is an engineer and I work as a conductor on a freight railroad. We load trains with coal to send to power plants to produce electricity.

lender.name: Libby
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed and want to help others
lender.occupational_info: retired school counselor

lender.name: Seacia
lender.loan_because: I am on the board of my mother's non-profit and I know how much every donation counts.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer. My favorite photographs are those that I take when I am traveling and learning about new places.

lender.name: Dwight
lender.loan_because: It's always better for people to improve their circumstances by entrepreneurship--not charity.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to set up and run their own and others' businesses.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to help someone.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and I want to change the current image of the US. The Bush years has made me embarrassed of my country. Most Americans would rather be part of a solution than bomb, murder and torture others.
lender.occupational_info: I repair, set up and configure computers, small networks, backup and wireless solutions.

lender.name: R J
lender.loan_because: I have been to Tanzania and seen the suffering that goes on. My family is planning to go again.
lender.occupational_info: I have been working on getting a library in my town. I have worked on it for about 4 years.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: It helps EVERYONE!
lender.occupational_info: I'm going to school to become a Nurse.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I simply want to help. I have had times in my life when I needed a helping hand. Sometimes I got it, sometimes not. I know what it's like to be turned down.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired but I stay busy teaching classes in alcohol and drug addiction recovery. I have had several careers ranging from topical fish farming to marketing director in several mid - size firms.

lender.name: Alex and Debbie
lender.loan_because: We are very blessed and love to give back!
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother and my husband is in sales.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I would like to help make a difference in the life of people in need.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: Mothers need to help each other. What an ingenious use for the internet!

lender.name: JoAnne
lender.loan_because: I have been self employed for many years and understand the challenges I faced starting and growing a business in the US. I have great compassion for those in countries fighting global poverty and yet have courage to work and start businesses. If they succeed, everyone wins.
lender.occupational_info: I help other business owners to market and create brand awareness for their product and services.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because:
I particularly want to encourage businesses that help "reduce, reuse, recycle", such as those working with used clothing, repairing appliances, or selling spare parts. This helps to reduce waste around the world!
I tend to shun businesses such as beauty salons since I view them as being somewhat frivolous.

lender.name: Rowan
lender.loan_because: My grandma gave me a gift certificate
lender.occupational_info: I'm interested in science and technology

lender.name: JoAnn
lender.occupational_info: I work in a chemistry lab where I work with chemicals and set up experiments for students to do so they can learn.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: my small loan creates big changes in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach elementary aged students.

lender.name: Rod
lender.occupational_info: Event Signage people.

lender.name: Napoleon
lender.loan_because: It's my nature to make it rain.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: The way to help people throughout the world is to supply them with the means to become self-sustaining. Money to start a business enables a person to be able to provide a sustainable income to support the family with the essentials needed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Nutritionist by education and profession. My work has been teaching people how to make food choices that positively impact their health. I currently started a business as a Pet Sitter where I go to people's homes when they are away and take care of their pets.

lender.name: James & Alice
lender.loan_because: "The social message of the Gospel must not be considered a theory, but above all else a basis and a motivation for action..." - Pope John Paul II (1991)

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I believe that our united similarities as a people are and will always be far greater than our distinguishing differences. What happens to one of us affects the others and if we can improve the life of just one person, is that not building a better world?

lender.name: Leon
lender.loan_because: I believe we should share our good fortune with others to help bring peace and prosperity on a personal level.
lender.occupational_info: Pharmaceutical development. I work on developing new drugs to treat cancer and rare diseases.

lender.name: Enya Isabel
lender.loan_because: I want people to have the opportunity to realize their dreams and because I care. Givers Gain!

lender.name: Thuy
lender.occupation: operation assistant for Supporting Fund for poor w

lender.name: william
lender.loan_because: Money is like manure - it's no good unless you spread it around.

lender.name: Janet and Doug
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I am in the process of raising money for KIVA by selling bandanas to my freinds, family, co-workers etc. in hopes to raise $1000 to loan to a business in need. It will take a bit of time to raise the money, but it will be all worth it!

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I like being able to help oher people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children ages 7-18 with learning diabilities.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: Someone needs it.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed.

lender.name: Jonathan and Tonia
lender.loan_because: We wish to make a positive impact on the world, and to set a good example for our son and daughter

lender.name: Alessandra
lender.loan_because: my mother always tells me that in many places in the world, people are poor. She always tells me to be generous, and to do my very best to help. Btw she is from Peru.
lender.occupational_info: Tengo 10 anos y mi madre es del Peru.

lender.name: Erik and Mary
lender.loan_because: It is one of the best ways to help someone who needs it.
lender.occupational_info: A lot of rejection and some hardship but worth every moment.

lender.name: Ashton
lender.loan_because: I know what it is to try to get a business off the ground. Sometimes, even a little help makes all the difference.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a writer and make movies for children.

lender.name: Hays Fam
lender.loan_because: We are a blessed family and consider it a priviledge to extend a helping hand to those who simply need a boost to better their lives.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I loan with the hope that the money will provide an opportunity for people in developing countries to live healthy and comfortable lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a volunteer in my neighborhood and for C.E.R.T.

lender.name: Jesse & Carmen
lender.loan_because: Given a chance, people will amaze you with their ambition, ingenuity and determination. For many people around the world, just a (relatively) little bit of money can open up a universe of opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: We enjoy our work. We also continually seek ways to be involved in our community and to support efforts to make the world a more peaceful and cleaner place for all.

lender.name: JoJo
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I lead workshops for people in business who want to learn to be even more effective leaders and team-workers.

lender.name: kelly
lender.loan_because: i am inspired to give back to our world
lender.occupational_info: i have lived in different parts of the world doing health education, currently I work for a university and help teach doctors and nurses about tuberculosis

lender.name: Brian

lender.loan_because: I believe I have been blessed and want to pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: I help people create and maintain their wealth.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: It gives me great joy to share the blessings God has entrusted to me!

lender.name: Dunya & Vanya
lender.loan_because: we love helping people in need

lender.name: Lisa and Walt
lender.loan_because: To help people raise their children, as they are the worlds future.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: microcredit loans are proven to help people kick start or grow their businesses. I also like being part of such a positive global initiative to combat poverty in the developing world.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: heather
lender.loan_because: I can...and I want to teach my young daughter that small acts of kindness can make all the difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: I love.
lender.occupational_info: I create artwork and websites.

lender.name: Jen and Maddy
lender.loan_because: All of these entrepreneurs deserve a chance to make a difference in their lives and countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a senior in college studying business. After I graduate I am going to attend law school.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: We all need to come together on this planet. A little help can go along way and mean the world to our friends and neighbors !

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to do something
lender.occupational_info: I direct airplanes and keep them from hitting each other

lender.name: Muh
lender.occupational_info: Technical Support, Businessman + Operation Manager KAFFA Virtual Network, Web Enterpreneur

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: My girlfriend went to Tanzania to work with the UN this Spring, and I wanted to do something to help the people there in honor of her visit.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the computer software that runs inside cell phones, helping people find ways to communicate with each other.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because: I want a better World
lender.occupational_info: 2D and 3D design Architecture, Design and Visual Communication

lender.loan_because: always a bit of effort makes a huge change...

I hope the Call of Duty gaming gods will see my good deeds and give me a break from getting shot in the back so damn much.

http://www.kiva.org/team/team_lowestoft

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to live in Australia - the best place on earth & if $25 from me can do so much to help others, then I cannot afford NOT to loan $25
lender.occupational_info: I care for my mother & sell some things online but I'm not working full time

lender.name: Marit
lender.loan_because: I want to support the efforts of people to build their own sustainable, small businesses. I especially like to loan to entrepreneurs in the regions where I live and work because I see their need for help on a daily basis.
lender.occupational_info: I manage legal reform projects in Central Asia.

lender.name: Norma
lender.loan_because: I have a few extra dollars.

lender.name: patrick
lender.loan_because: later
lender.occupational_info: fool of challenges,you have to listern to all ,and guide them to the best of my ability

lender.name: Lois
lender.loan_because: I'm able to help in a small way
lender.occupational_info: I make sure everyone gets their paycheque every two weeks

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: Those to whom much ,has been given, much is expected. I need to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Videographer / business owner

lender.name: Liam
lender.loan_because: It's the least I could do. Besides, my wife is from West Africa and I would like to do what I can to help people from her part of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I study the European Middle Ages.

lender.name: Kalantha
lender.loan_because: I believe that I am part of a family which includes all people, and that I am called to enable others to live independent and dignified lives
lender.occupational_info: Trying to become what I was created to be

lender.name: Pappy Steve
lender.loan_because: I don't have a lot of money so I like to put it where it can make a big difference in someone's life. Jesus said: "Freely you have received - freely give!"

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I distribute the news from Canadian newspapers electronically throughout the world

lender.name: Jonn
lender.loan_because:
My wife and I have been fortunate to have been helped by others in the past so we would like to pay it forward.
We are after all, stewards of God's great wealth.
lender.occupational_info:
I fix computers and help support the software that runs on them.
My wife is a nurse and works in a cancer treatment facility.

lender.name: Devin
lender.occupation: Elementary school Spanish and science teacher
lender.loan_because: When I was studying at the University KwaZulu Natal in South Africa, one of my education for development profs would always say that "rural S.A. just needs more schools, condoms and micro-credit."
lender.occupational_info: I help children cultivate their comfort with and connection to the natural world. I'm an environmental studies teacher.

lender.name: Matej
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs

lender.name: Helen & Steve
lender.loan_because: We're lucky enough not to need one ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: Helen works in University Admin & Steve's an Air Traffic Controller.

lender.name: Souto
lender.loan_because: Matthew 22: 37-39
lender.occupational_info: Design for a better world

lender.name: marivic
lender.loan_because: i want to start my restaurant business because i want to utilize my talent and gift for cooking. Likewise, i want to help people by employing them so that they can have a better life by sending their children to school. It will also help my brother and sister who are not employed at the moment and i believe that they are the best people that can help me establish my dream business . I have two children and my youngest will be entering college this June 2008. I want to help my husband to be able to send our children to good school. We cannot do this if we will rely solely on our monthly salary that is why I want to start my own business. This will also a good way to train my children on how to become an entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently working as a Protocol Officer in the House of Representatives but i do catering business too. I am a good cook and i want to focus more on my catering business. At present, my business is a one-woman-army since i do everything from planning to marketing and cooking. If i have big catering contract, i hired 3 to 5 housewives to be able to help them to augment their husbands' salaries.

lender.name: Willie
lender.loan_because: I just enjoy helping people and making a difference in their live.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Domestic Violence and Anger Management classes for the State of Georgia.

lender.name: Subash & Gita
lender.loan_because: We are glad we can help

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I can help people to help themselves build a better life.

lender.name: Leigh
lender.loan_because: I know I have far more than most.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching primary school children.

lender.name: Dougherty Godparents
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: We sell beautiful old furniture from different parts of the world.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I hope in some small way, I can help others improve their lives

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: it is my opportunity to change lives and make a positve impact in the world.
lender.occupational_info: humanitarian

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I'm inspired by people who want to better their lives.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I'm inspired to help people by the spirit and memory of my friend Amornrat Tiansawat.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: It takes just a little water for a seed to sprout and just a little money for a person to succeed. I like to help where I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a new business development consultant with a heavy emphasis on market research and understanding the needs of the market. Like many of these entrepreneurs, we need to keep our ear close to the market to really know how to suceed.

lender.name: Kecia
lender.loan_because: We all are connected. If you need help I need help...you are part of me I am part of you. Love

lender.name: Frank & Carol
lender.loan_because: in a very small way we are making the world a better place.

lender.name: Letitia
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. I know how hard it is to obtain a business loan as a woman in the United States. I can't imagine how hard it is for a woman in some of the areas that Kiva supports.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 20th Century History, Economics, and Sociology at a small high school of 850 students.

lender.name: Joe, Gaby and Nhung
lender.loan_because: People deserve a chance. Even a small amount can help.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves managing the growth of Clinical research services.

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: I want to help women as women have helped me.

lender.name: Marsha
lender.occupational_info: tons of fun

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Helping someone help themselves is a great form of giving ... and receiving.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I Care!
lender.occupational_info: My work is repairing machines that make sure there is no helium leaking through products we use around the world today.

lender.name: Maya
lender.loan_because: I want to help women around the world achieve their economic and personal goals, whatever those might be.
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals and businesses organize and utilize their spaces according to their desired goals.

lender.name: CGF
lender.loan_because: We care.
lender.occupational_info: NCI Genotyping Lab.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I'm trying to do the best I can to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Manual labor :)

lender.name: Dipankar
lender.loan_because: Greater joy of giving a hand up instead of hand out.
lender.occupational_info: Computer Software Developer

lender.name: amanda
lender.loan_because: Helping others is what life is about. Just doing JAHs work.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at the University of California Santa Cruz, where I'm studying Spanish, Portuguese, and Social Documentation.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: This is one step toward leveling the global economic playing field.
lender.occupational_info: As an art dealer I am able to connect artists with collectors. This enables the artists to support themselves with their creative endeavors. At the same time, I am able to enjoy being surrounded by beautiful paintings.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because:
I think Jim Henson said it best ...
“My hope still is to leave the world a little bit better for my having been here.”
lender.occupational_info: I study fungi, specifically how fungi are related to each other and how they are adapted to be dispersed in the environment.

lender.name: Raquel
lender.loan_because: I like to help hard working people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse.

lender.name: Jim & Susan
lender.loan_because: We are a middle class midwestern couple with 7 children and 11 grandchildren, all are healthy and we feel so fortunate, for that reason we feel we should share our wealth and help as many people as we can.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because:
I believe that my borrowers will succeed if they are given a chance.
God has blessed me, so I should bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I write programs for computers.

lender.name: Sean & Jessica
lender.loan_because: We want to make the dream of successful, self-sufficient business in growing communities around the world, a reality. We are blessed and others should be as fortunate.

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: I like helping other people and I like how the program works. It's the gift that keeps on giving.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I believe this is truly teaching people to fish, not simply feeding the hungry once or twice.
lender.occupational_info: E-Business

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: micro-development programs alleviate underlying causes of conflict
lender.occupational_info: I am research director for an academic research project that tracks the political status of ethnic groups globally.

lender.name: Cory and Chris
lender.loan_because: our wonderful friend, Denise got us and all her friends Kiva loans for Christmas! We hope to continue the trend of giving with all our family and friends. It's so great to be part of such a worthwhile program to help others in our global family.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a community pharmacy and my husband works in an elementary school teaching English to children who come to Canada from other countries.

lender.name: Karina
lender.occupation: Founder and Executive Director of a non-profit
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. We need to help eachother as often as we can, this life is hard enough as it is. Let's do our part to make it a little easier.
lender.occupational_info: I made it my life's mission to bring comfort and love to impoverished, orphaned and abused children around the world. Whether it's giving hugs, toys, clothes or food; I live to serve and be the voice for those who are hurting.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: how can I not?

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: my life is so blessed that I can...and I admire all people who are working hard to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I sell beautiful handpainted ceramics imported from Italy

lender.name: adam
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: right now im a student studying in london, but I help run my families farm raising alpacas for wool and show animals and will take over this business when the time comes.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I worked and traveled in Latin America and saw first hand what even a few resources can do to significantly change a persons's -- and a family's -- standard of living. I also learned a lot about myself, not the least of which is that by giving even a little, I get so much in return.
lender.occupational_info: I write user guides for computer software. I also write about movies, especially horror movies. You can check out my page on Squidoo where a lot of my articles are published. And if you buy any of the movies, a portion of the proceeds goes to Kiva!

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: I believe in a hand up not a hand out.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for all that God has given me. I really wanted to give something back. I know what it is like to be poor, have children at home and no real skills. Back in 1997 a special person gave me a leg up and helped me become a realtor and develop my 'inner saleswoman'! I am happy to say because of this person's generosity that I am a leader in my field and have the comforts that success and income can bring.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who rent homes become homeowners. I also help people who own homes, sell them.

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to, and I want to share that with others.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe capitalism is the best way to get ahead. I am willing to support those who want to accept the risks and the rewards.

lender.name: Marlee
lender.loan_because: I feel it is the best way to give others a chance to bring themselves and their families out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a senior at U of Hawaii at Manoa, I also volunteer in a biomedical research lab and hope to soon be pursuing my Ph.D..

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I believe the ability to pursue happiness is a basic human right. If I can help others improve their lives by making loans to them, then I will do so.
lender.occupational_info: I help raise money for a school by writing news articles, letters, and internet posts about the school's students, teachers, and alumni. Writing these articles helps convince people who have the means to do so give money to the school for financial aid, new buildings, good teachers, and more.

lender.name: Delma
lender.loan_because: Even though I live in the US, I know what it is like to be homeless and without funds for even the most basic needs. I would like to help other women to rise above poverty and be able to take care of themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I used to drive a school bus. I would pick the chiden up at their homes and drive them to school and then when school was over, I would pick them up and drive them back home.

lender.name: Scott and Tina
lender.loan_because: We loan because it is a great thing to do to play one's good fortunes forward to others who are less fortunate. The spirit of another human being and the earth are the greatest things to which any one can contribute.
lender.occupational_info: I stock fruits and vegetables at a grocery store. My wife cares for our two children. I am also a artist and writer in my spare time. My wife is working on crafting some Tiny Traveling Teddy (small Teddy Bears).

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I can help people achieve the goals they want to pursue.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good - pretty selfish, huh?

lender.name: Cory
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me more than I could ever deserve, and I want to share that blessing with others.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: fighting global poverty is the most important issue of the 21st century.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to educate myself so that one day I can make a bigger difference in the world. One day I hope to make films to educate others everywhere.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I believe in directly helping people to improve their lives and the communities in which they live.
lender.occupational_info: I investigate charges of discrimination in the sale or rental of housing.

lender.name: Rip
lender.loan_because: I've traveled to many of the places Kiva is represented and have seen what a helping hand can do.

lender.name: PKPC
lender.loan_because: If you can help a person to help themselves, you can have a permanent and positive effect in all directions.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the notion that one person can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a law firm in Greater Cincinnati.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I wish to help small businesses
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their dental problems

lender.name: Alicia
lender.occupation: Administrative side of a healthcare system

lender.name: MARIA
lender.loan_because: I want to make a change in peoples' lives. Kiva gives me the opportunity yo reach people all over the world.

lender.name: Aimee
lender.loan_because: I'm a helper. That's what I do.

lender.name: Jackson
lender.loan_because: i want to help others who dont have it as good as i doand help them provide for there family
lender.occupational_info: go to school 6 hours ,come home do homework,play sports,play video games and then go to bed

lender.name: Mary Jane
lender.loan_because: I believe that every person who is willing to work deserves a chance to succeed. I have been helped by others in my life, and I feel responsible for helping someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I write books, short stories, and articles. I make my living by writing for companies--brochures, web sites, and feature articles. One of the characters in the book that I am writing now is from Ethiopia and I feel a connection through him to Africa although I have never been there.

lender.name: tricia
lender.loan_because: Because those who have the resources should help those who don't. I am very lucky to be able to provide for others.
lender.occupational_info: I produce TV commercials for a living

lender.name: Susan B
lender.loan_because: I am happy in life. I hope to teach my grandchild, Katie, be do the same. There is nothing like being able to help another. I want this to follow me after I leave this world and travel somewhere exciting. Being able to assist those less fortunate is what we are supposed to do. To me, it is a privilage to be able to help. I do not have extended wealth, I am middle America. Twenty five extra dollars or twenty five million, it doesn't matter, it is our duty to help when we can.
lender.occupational_info: I paint, design clothing, make jelwery, grandmother to death! , My wonderful husband, Ron, and I travel and just have fun. With amost everything I do has something to do with the arts . I am President of a Local Union for IATSE wardrobe, which means I work with professional personalities and assist them during their performances with their clothing. I have been with the theatre for almost 40 years and during that time have worked with some great actors and great people..I just want to help those who want to improve their lives and the lives of their families. I have been blessed over they years with a wonderful life and family..Kiva is one small way of paying back..GOOD luck to all..

lender.name: Eckmans-Sipes-Christmans
lender.loan_because: We chose Kiva as our family's annual Christmas charity for 2007 and plan to reinvest the loan money we receive back in other Kiva requesters.
lender.occupational_info: Our family is made up of retired parents, three adult sisters (one works for the government, one works for a public library, and one is raising children), and our families.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: i very much like this initiative!

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: it can only make this harsh world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I care for tiny premature baby in one hospital and big adult "babies" in the Emergency ward in another hospital...
